00008 #import "ASIS3ListRequest.h"
00009 #import "ASIS3BucketObject.h"

00011 
00012 static NSDateFormatter *dateFormatter = nil;
00013 
00014 // Private stuff
00015 @interface ASIS3ListRequest ()
00016         @property (retain, nonatomic) NSString *currentContent;
00017         @property (retain, nonatomic) NSString *currentElement;
00018         @property (retain, nonatomic) ASIS3BucketObject *currentObject;
00019         @property (retain, nonatomic) NSMutableArray *objects;
00020 @end
00021 
00022 @implementation ASIS3ListRequest
00023 
00024 + (void)initialize
00025 {
00026         dateFormatter = [[NSDateFormatter alloc] init];
00027         [dateFormatter setLocale:[[[NSLocale alloc] initWithLocaleIdentifier:@"en_US_POSIX"] autorelease]];
00028         [dateFormatter setTimeZone:[NSTimeZone timeZoneWithAbbreviation:@"UTC"]];
00029         [dateFormatter setDateFormat:@"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'.000Z'"];
00030 }
00031 
00032 + (id)listRequestWithBucket:(NSString *)bucket
00033 {
00034         ASIS3ListRequest *request = [[[self alloc] initWithURL:[NSURL URLWithString:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"http://%@.s3.amazonaws.com",bucket]]] autorelease];
00035         [request setBucket:bucket];
00036         return request;
00037 }
00038 
00039 - (void)dealloc
00040 {
00041         [currentObject release];
00042         [currentElement release];
00043         [currentContent release];
00044         [objects release];
00045         [prefix release];
00046         [marker release];
00047         [delimiter release];
00048         [super dealloc];
00049 }
00050 
00051 - (void)createQueryString
00052 {
00053         NSMutableArray *queryParts = [[[NSMutableArray alloc] init] autorelease];
00054         if ([self prefix]) {
00055                 [queryParts addObject:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"prefix=%@",[[self prefix] stringByAddingPercentEscapesUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding]]];
00056         }
00057         if ([self marker]) {
00058                 [queryParts addObject:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"marker=%@",[[self marker] stringByAddingPercentEscapesUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding]]];
00059         }
00060         if ([self delimiter]) {
00061                 [queryParts addObject:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"delimiter=%@",[[self delimiter] stringByAddingPercentEscapesUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding]]];
00062         }
00063         if ([self maxResultCount] > 0) {
00064                 [queryParts addObject:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"delimiter=%hi",[self maxResultCount]]];
00065         }
00066         if ([queryParts count]) {
00067                 [self setURL:[NSURL URLWithString:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@?%@",[[self url] absoluteString],[queryParts componentsJoinedByString:@"&"]]]];
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 - (void)main
00072 {
00073         [self createQueryString];
00074         [super main];
00075 }
00076 
00077 - (NSArray *)bucketObjects
00078 {
00079         if ([self objects]) {
00080                 return [self objects];
00081         }
00082         [self setObjects:[[[NSMutableArray alloc] init] autorelease]];
00083         NSXMLParser *parser = [[[NSXMLParser alloc] initWithData:[self responseData]] autorelease];
00084         [parser setDelegate:self];
00085         [parser setShouldProcessNamespaces:NO];
00086         [parser setShouldReportNamespacePrefixes:NO];
00087         [parser setShouldResolveExternalEntities:NO];
00088         [parser parse];
00089         return [self objects];
00090 }
00091 
00092 - (void)parser:(NSXMLParser *)parser didStartElement:(NSString *)elementName namespaceURI:(NSString *)namespaceURI qualifiedName:(NSString *)qName attributes:(NSDictionary *)attributeDict
00093 {
00094         [self setCurrentElement:elementName];
00095         
00096         if ([elementName isEqualToString:@"Contents"]) {
00097                 [self setCurrentObject:[ASIS3BucketObject objectWithBucket:[self bucket]]];
00098         }
00099         [self setCurrentContent:@""];
00100 }
00101 
00102 - (void)parser:(NSXMLParser *)parser didEndElement:(NSString *)elementName namespaceURI:(NSString *)namespaceURI qualifiedName:(NSString *)qName
00103 {
00104         if ([elementName isEqualToString:@"Contents"]) {
00105                 [objects addObject:currentObject];
00106                 [self setCurrentObject:nil];
00107         } else if ([elementName isEqualToString:@"Key"]) {
00108                 [[self currentObject] setKey:[self currentContent]];
00109         } else if ([elementName isEqualToString:@"LastModified"]) {
00110                 [[self currentObject] setLastModified:[dateFormatter dateFromString:[self currentContent]]];
00111         } else if ([elementName isEqualToString:@"ETag"]) {
00112                 [[self currentObject] setETag:[self currentContent]];
00113         } else if ([elementName isEqualToString:@"Size"]) {
00114                 [[self currentObject] setSize:(unsigned long long)[[self currentContent] longLongValue]];
00115         } else if ([elementName isEqualToString:@"ID"]) {
00116                 [[self currentObject] setOwnerID:[self currentContent]];
00117         } else if ([elementName isEqualToString:@"DisplayName"]) {
00118                 [[self currentObject] setOwnerName:[self currentContent]];
00119         }
00120 }
00121 
00122 - (void)parser:(NSXMLParser *)parser foundCharacters:(NSString *)string
00123 {
00124         [self setCurrentContent:[[self currentContent] stringByAppendingString:string]];
00125 }
